mapper.select: SELECT post_no, cate_no, post_title, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YY-MM-DD') reg_date FROM post WHERE cate_no = #{cateNo} ORDER BY post_no DESC

SELECT post_no, cate_no, post_title, post_content, reg_date FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, post_no, c.cate_no, post_title, post_content, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YY-MM-DD') reg_date FROM post p, (SELECT cate_no FROM category WHERE id = #{id}) c WHERE p.cate_no = c.cate_no ORDER BY post_no DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
